#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    map<int,int> m;
    priority_queue<int,std::vector<int>,std::greater<int> > qmin;
    priority_queue<int> qmax;
    int t,a,b,cnt1=0,cnt2=0,tot=0;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d",&a);
        if(a==1){
            scanf("%d",&b);
            tot++;
            qmax.push(b);
            cnt2++;
            if(tot%3==0)
            {

                int temp=qmax.top(); qmax.pop();
                qmin.push(temp);
                cnt2--; cnt1++;
            }
            else{
                if(cnt1>0 && qmin.top()<qmax.top())
                {
                    int temp=qmin.top(); qmin.pop();
                    qmax.push(temp);
                    temp=qmax.top(); qmax.pop();
                    qmin.push(temp);
                }
            }

        }
        else {
                if(!cnt1) cout<<"No reviews yet\n";
                else cout<<qmin.top()<<"\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
